MAIN_MESSAGE: It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 7:30PM in the CH63 postcode area of Wirral following reports of a grounded overhead line. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 9:30PM We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:53PM on 15th March 2021
